img_summary: The image shows an in-game menu from a video game, where the player interacts with a character named "Shen Monkey." The menu options include "Upgrade Gourds," "Upgrade Drinks," "Brew," "Store," and "Leave." The currently selected option is "Upgrade Gourds," with a description below stating, "Upgrade Gourds that have been obtained." Shen Monkey, a humanoid monkey character, is seated on a mat surrounded by large jars in a natural, outdoor setting illuminated by warm light.
